review: Dr Abhijit gave a complete and thorough assessment and answered all our doubts. He was also accommodating with follow up schedules. He gave due time to not just assess the current pain point, but also did a complete physical examination to find any other relevant issues.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable review

review: Very meticulous and through. Explains everything, from cause of injury to treatment very well, 10/10 would recommend to anyone!

Highly professional doctor. I didn't need to explain much. I had a small injuiry and a swollen toe which was terribly hurting. Dr. Tayade sent me immediately for x-ray. It was no fracture and I got medication for the pain. I'm very satisfied and it was the best visit to a doctor I had as a foreigner in India so far. Many doctors just give medication without any proper diagnosis. This wasn't the case with Dr. Tayade. He is professional, honest and friendly. Highly recommendable.
reply_text: Thank you for you valuable feedback

review:
I consulted Dr Tayade for Knee Pain. He had patience to my complaints and examined thoroughly. He gave me 360 degree treatment covering all aspects.  I have recovered in less than 7 days for the pain I was suffering for last 5 years. 

He is well versed and professional with excellent skill sets. 

I highly recommend him  for proven results.
Doctor is nice listened to the problem nicely Nd then diagnosed it. I had an issue with my one feet not walking so he easily explained the issue after x ray and put the plaster. Nice doctor
reply_text: Thank you for you valuable feedback.

review: Good doctor to talk to. He was patient in listeing my story and helping me through with the solution.I like doctor who focus more on resolving problem through lifestyle change rather than focusing much on the medicines. He is one among those.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback .

review: ** ** * ***** ****** ****  ********* ********* ***** *** ***** . I will recommend all my friends and family to consult him related to orthopedic problem.

*** ******* ****** ** *** ** *** ************ ********** ******** *** *** **** ********* ** ****** ********* I have been consulting him for sport-related injuries; he combines drug treatment with holistic recovery plan that ensures a faster recovery and more importantly ‘peace-of-mind’ through the treatment.His ability to establish an empathetic understanding of patient’s condition is a stand-out. He has my highest recommendation.
Would definitely recommend. The doctor patiently explained the issue, the treatment and was quite reassuring. It was my second visit (for different issues) and each time it’s been great experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
